text: Achelonia is an extinct genus of sea turtle belong to Eurysternidae. Its type species is Achelonia formosa.Anquetin, Puntener, and Joyce, 2017. A review of the fossil record of turtles of the clade Thalassochelydia. Bulletin of the Peabody Museum of Natural History 58 (2):317-369. ==References== Category:Late Jurassic turtles Category:Fossils of Germany Category:Prehistoric turtle genera Category:Taxa named by Christian Erich Hermann von Meyer Category:Extinct turtles
title: Achelonia
